lst.name: sentence
lst.str: CAIRO - Egypt's opposition charged that yesterday's general election was rigged, as early results showed President Hosni Mubarak's ruling National Democratic Party (NDP) heading for a big majority in Parliament.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Meanwhile, visiting British Corporate Affairs Minister Michael Howard told Japan to resolve a telecommunications row with his country or face an abrupt deterioration in trading relations.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: ZEEBRUGGE, Belgium - A stricken British car ferry, in which up to 140 bodies could still be trapped, rose slowly from the North Sea in a mammoth salvage operation off the coast.
